MartinMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
MartinMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

MartinMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
MartinMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
MartinMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

MartinMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
MartinMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

MartinMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
MartinMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !MartinMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

MartinMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
MartinMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !MartinMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
